Scripts.OnLoad: local anchorto, anchor = MoveAnything_SizingAnchor( this ); this:SetPoint( anchor, this:GetParent():GetName(), anchorto, 0, 0 );

Scripts.OnMouseUp: this:StopMovingOrSizing() if( arg1 == "RightButton" ) then if( IsShiftKeyDown() ) then Print( "Locator left: "..this:GetLeft().." bottom: "..this:GetBottom().. " width: "..this:GetWidth().." height: "..this:GetHeight() ); else this:Hide(); end end
